title: Technical Specifications
body_html:
BrainBit EEG Headband - Technical Specifications

General

  • Device Type: Wearable EEG Headband
  • Intended Use: Life/Health Tracking, Neurofeedback, Education

EEG Channels

  • Number of Channels: 4
  • Electrode Placement: O1, O2, T3, T4 (standard EEG positions)

Data Acquisition

  • Sampling Rate: (Need to find the exact sampling rate from reliable sources)
  • Data Resolution: (Need to find the data resolution from reliable sources)

Connectivity

  • Wireless: Bluetooth

Physical Characteristics

  • Dimensions: (Need to find the dimensions from reliable sources)

Software/SDK

  • SDK Availability: Yes, for various operating systems (Android, etc.)
  • Data Output Format: (Need to confirm the data output format from reliable sources)

Notes

  • Some specifications are marked as "Need to find from reliable sources." Please consult the official BrainBit documentation or website for accurate and up-to-date information.
  • It is important to consult the official BrainBit documentation for precise technical details and usage guidelines.
